# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and a furnace, but the furnace position is not specified
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) and a furnace, but the furnace position is not specified

### Copper cable factory
No information about the factory is available in the logs.

### Electricity generator at position(111.5, -32.0)
Consists of steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system
Consists of transport-belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport-belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Make sure to provide fuel to the entities that are out of fuel, such as burner-mining-drill and boiler.
### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source items are available for the entities that are waiting, such as burner-inserter.
### Errors when entities are not connected
- Connect the entities that are not connected, such as steam-engine, to the required networks.
### Errors when entities are empty or have no ingredients
- Ensure that the entities have the required ingredients or items, such as pipe-group and stone-furnace.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Plug the entities into the electric network, such as electricity-group.


# NAMESPACE
No information about the namespace is available in the logs.
